<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_customerservice_related_party</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sn_customerservice_related_party">x_1331380_pro_bono_opportunity_acceptedCHANGESTO1^EQ<item display_value="Yes" endquery="false" field="x_1331380_pro_bono_opportunity_accepted" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="1"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Reduce Staffing Requirments</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
	
	var gr=new GlideRecord("x_1331380_pro_bono_staffing_requirements");
	
	gr.addQuery("timekeeper_type",current.x_1331380_pro_bono_time_keeper.time_keeper_type);
	gs.addInfoMessage(current.x_1331380_pro_bono_time_keeper.time_keeper_type);
	
	gr.addQuery("opportunity",current.x_1331380_pro_bono_opportunity);
	// gs.addInfoMessage(current.x_1331380_pro_bono_opportunity);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next()){
		gs.addInfoMessage(gr.number);
		if(gr.number>0){
			gs.addInfoMessage(gr.number);
			gr.number=parseInt(gr.number-1);
			gr.update();
		}
	}
	// gs.addInfoMessage('hi');
    // var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1331380_pro_bono_staffing_requirements");
    // gr.addQuery("timekeeper_type", current.x_1331380_pro_bono_time_keeper_);
    // gr.addQuery("opportunity", current.x_1331380_pro_bono_opportunity);
    // gr.query();
    // if (gr.next()) {
    //     gs.addInfoMessage("hello");
    //     if(gr.number>0){
    //     	gr.number=parseInt(gr.number-1);
    //     	gr.update();
    //     }
    //     else if(gr.number<=0){
    //     	gr.delete();

    //     // }
    // }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-15 08:34:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>38a1fd0e472502104e3dfe02d16d43f6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reduce Staffing Requirments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Pro Bono ServiceNow" source="x_1331380_pro_bono">8b514b8647c502104e3dfe02d16d4300</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Pro Bono ServiceNow">8b514b8647c502104e3dfe02d16d4300</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_38a1fd0e472502104e3dfe02d16d43f6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-15 10:51:50</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=38a1fd0e472502104e3dfe02d16d43f6"/></record_update>
